hasDisputesAndComplaints.title: Have there been any disputes or complaints regarding this property or a property nearby?

neighbourDevelopment.title: Is the seller aware of any proposals to develop property or land nearby, or of any proposals to make alterations to buildings nearby?

japaneseKnotweed.title: Is the property affected by Japanese knotweed?

plantOnOtherLand.title: Is any part of the septic tank, sewage treatment plant (including any soakaway or outfall) or cesspool, or the access to it, outside the boundary of the property?

difficultiesObtainingInsurance.title: Has any buildings insurance taken out by the seller ever been:

isInsured.title: Does the seller insure the property?

hasBeenFlooded.title: Has any part of the property (whether buildings or surrounding garden or land) ever been flooded?

haveBoundaryFeaturesMoved.title: Is the seller aware of any boundary feature having been moved in the last 10 years or during the seller’s period of ownership if longer?

adjacentLandIncluded.title: During the seller’s ownership, has any adjacent land or property been purchased by the seller?

flyingFreehold.title: Does any part of the property or any building on the property overhang, or project under, the boundary of the neighbouring property or road, for example cellars under the pavement, overhanging eaves or covered walkways?

pipesWiresCablesDrainsToProperty.title: Do any drains, pipes or wires serving the property cross any neighbour’s property?

formalOrInformalAgreements.title: Is there any agreement or arrangement about drains, pipes or wires?

outstandingClaimsOrApplications.title: Have any claims been made under any of these guarantees or warranties?

otherPropertyInChain.title: Is this sale dependent on the seller completing the purchase of another property on the same day?
